00002  * targa.h
00003  *
00004  * Copyright (C) 2006 - 2009 by Joshua S. English.
00005  *
00006  * This software is the intellectual property of Joshua S. English. This
00007  * software is provided 'as-is', without any express or implied warranty. In no
00008  * event will the author be held liable for any damages arising from the use of
00009  * this software.
00010  *
00011  * Permission is granted to anyone to use this software for any purpose,
00012  * including commercial applications, and to alter it and redistribute it
00013  * freely, subject to the following restrictions:
00014  *
00015  * 1. The origin of this software must not be misrepresented; you must not
00016  *    claim that you wrote the original software. If you use this software in
00017  *    a product, an acknowledgment in the product documentation would be
00018  *    appreciated but is not required.
00019  *
00020  * 2. Altered source version must be plainly marked as such, and must not be
00021  *    misrepresented as being original software.
00022  *
00023  * 3. This notice may not be removed or altered from any source distribution.
00024  *
00025  *
00026  * Notes:
00027  *
00028  * A plugin to read targa (TGA) image files into an OpenGL-compatible RGBA
00029  * format, header file.
00030  *
00031  * Written by Joshua S. English.
00032  *
00033  *
00034  * The TARGA Specification:
00035  *
00036  *  Position:   Length:     Description:
00037  *  --------    ------      -----------
00038  *  0           1           length of the image ID
00039  *  1           1           type of color map included (if any)
00040  *                              0   =>  no color map
00041  *                              1   =>  has color map
00042  *  2           1           image type
00043  *                              0   =>  no image data
00044  *                              1   =>  color-mapped image
00045  *                              2   =>  true-color image
00046  *                              3   =>  black & white image
00047  *                              9   =>  RLE color-mapped image
00048  *                              10  =>  RLE true-color image
00049  *                              11  =>  RLE black & white image
00050  *  3           2           index of the first color-map entry as an offest
00051  *                          into the color-map table
00052  *  5           2           color-map length (number of entries)
00053  *  7           1           color-map entry length - (number of bits per entry)
00054  *  8           2           x-origin of image
00055  *  10          2           y-origin of image
00056  *  12          2           image width in pixels
00057  *  14          2           image height in pixels
00058  *  16          1           pixel depth - the number of bits per pixel
00059  *  17          1           image descriptor
00060  *  n           var         image id - only exists if non-zero
00061  *  n           var         color-map data - only exists if non-zero
00062  *  n           var         image data
00063  */
00064

00073 #define TARGA_COLOR_GREEN                                   2
00074 #define TARGA_COLOR_BLUE                                    3
00075 #define TARGA_COLOR_ALPHA                                   4

00079 
00080 typedef struct _Targa {
00081     int width;
00082     int height;
00083     int imageLength;
00084     unsigned char *image;
00085 } Targa;
